channel.title: Clan requirement picture
channel.description:
I don't really know what to name the title, but this is what I need. It doesn't have to be all fancy, I just want a background that goes good with the text. Nothing major. Ignore the Super Swag, it's part of the site lol.
This is what I want it to say:
[center][size=22pt]SS Skillers[/size] (Super Swag Skillers)
[b]Requirements:[/b] Level 3 combat Total level of at least 500
[b]Rules:[/b] No flaming/spamming No racist comments No comments about other peoples family's No asking for a rank No begging Be polite/helpful
[b]Application:[/b] Combat level: Total level: In-game name: [/center]
If anybody could make that for me, that would be great! Thanks!

item.title: Clan requirement picture
item.dc:creator: @EatMyWhiteStuff EatMyWhiteStuff
item.description:
@EatMyWhiteStuff wrote:

I don’t really know what to name the title, but this is what I need.
It doesn’t have to be all fancy, I just want a background that goes good with the text. Nothing major.
Ignore the Super Swag, it’s part of the site lol.

This is what I want it to say:

[center][size=22pt]SS Skillers[/size]
(Super Swag Skillers)

Requirements:
Level 3 combat
Total level of at least 500

Rules:
No flaming/spamming
No racist comments
No comments about other peoples family’s
No asking for a rank
No begging
Be polite/helpful

Total level:

[/center]

If anybody could make that for me, that would be great!
Thanks!
